pr_title: [squeezebox] Add some examples to the .items file example

timeline.message:
Add some example for the .items file

As I struggled to sort out exactly how to set up the .items file for the item type 'image' and define the album art channel I though the documentation could be clarified with an example or 3.

timeline.bodyText: readd was correct before, but if you want it to be a bit clearer you could change it to re-add instead.
timeline.author: cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -128,7 +138,7 @@ Currently, only favorites from the root level of the LMS favorites list are expo
 -   Add some favorites to your favorites list in LMS (local music playlists, Pandora, Slacker, Internet radio, etc.).
 Keep all favorites at the root level (i.e. favorites in sub-folders will be ignored).
 
--   If you're on an older openHAB build, you may need to delete and readd your squeezebox server and player things to pick up the new channels.
+-   If you're on an older openHAB build, you may need to delete and read your squeezebox server and player things to pick up the new channels.

replies.bodyText: "re-add" is better, it also makes sense.
replies.author: LeeC77

timeline.bodyText: While it looks funny, readd is correct. To make more clear, you could hyphenate (i.e. re-add) as an alternative.
timeline.author: mhilbush
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -128,7 +138,7 @@ Currently, only favorites from the root level of the LMS favorites list are expo
 -   Add some favorites to your favorites list in LMS (local music playlists, Pandora, Slacker, Internet radio, etc.).
 Keep all favorites at the root level (i.e. favorites in sub-folders will be ignored).
 
--   If you're on an older openHAB build, you may need to delete and readd your squeezebox server and player things to pick up the new channels.
+-   If you're on an older openHAB build, you may need to delete and read your squeezebox server and player things to pick up the new channels.

replies.bodyText:
Hi, I agree re-add is better.
Not sure how to change that, this is my first try at a pull request.
okay I think I've made the change this time.
replies.author: LeeC77
